Posts.Content: I like the accutane/avandia combo. it causes the cancer cells to differentiate or commit suicide and is nonchemo, relatively nontoxic. 2ME2, the "good" estrogen should always be used. oral copper chelators stop any cancer from spreading
Posts.Title: tamoxifen

Posts.Content: betulinic acid (derived from white birch bark), when given ahead of taxol gives very dramatic results
Posts.Title: taxol & betulinic acid kick butt! (probably cure)
